ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl

Class GlslTessProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.AbstractGlslProgram
      • ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl.GlslTessProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, GpuShaderProgram

    class GlslTessProgram
extends AbstractGlslProgram
    Concrete implementation of a shader-program to process a tessellation.

    This implementation contains, and submits, all the input data for the tessellation.vert vertex shader, tessellation.tesc control shader, tessellation.tese evaluation shader, and tessellation.frag frag shader. Changes in the inputs of the shader program will require changes to this implementation.

    Author:
    Kevin S. Cheong
